blocked.message: To receive notifications for new blog posts, please follow the instructions below:
blocked.title: Notification settings procedure

action.resubscribed: You have set to receive blog post notifications again
action.subscribe: You have started receiving notifications for new blog posts! Look forward to it.
action.unsubscribed: You have stopped receiving blog post notifications. You can resume at any time!

message.prenotify: Do you want to receive notifications for new blog posts?

state.subscribed: You are receiving notifications for new blog posts
state.unsubscribed: You can set to receive blog post notifications

welcome.message: Thank you for setting up notifications! We will deliver new blog posts.
